name: Silver Hail
description:
Silver Hail is a simple top-down shooter with some light stealth elements. It was built using SDL2 and OpenGL.

Some gameplay tips:

  • Firing and other noises will alert nearby enemies
  • If you are about to be squashed by a wall, never fear - it will smash, alerting nearby enemies but not killing you
  • If you hold down to keep firing, you will keep firing in that same direction no matter which way you move
